# Westward - A Journey into the Wild West ## Requirement Summary This document outlines three different HTML solutions for creating a cowboy-themed website for the game "Westward," set in the year 1830. Each solution incorporates unique design elements and features to enhance user engagement. ## Code Generated #1: Basic Cowboy Style Website ```html Westward - The Wild West Adventure

Howdy, Partner!

Welcome to Westward, a multiplayer open-world game set during the wild and gritty days of U.S. western expansion (1803–1861).

What’s the game actually about?

  • Build stuff – Form towns, build up communities, or start your own tribe.
  • Explore huge maps – Inspired by Yellowstone and other gorgeous spots from the American West.
  • Choose your side – Settlers or tribal leaders.
  • Make your own story – Be peaceful, aggressive, sneaky, or creative.
  • Mess around with friends – Just don’t get shot!
